synopsis.text:
Overjoyed by the prospect of a summer vacation at her uncle's house, young Hotaru Takegawa finds herself lost in a mystical forest teeming with spirits. As she frantically searches for a way out, she encounters Gin, a captivating boy cloaked in a mask. Eager for human connection, Hotaru rushes towards him, only to be sternly rebuffed. Gin reveals that a tragic curse has befallen him, one that would vanish his existence if ever touched by a mortal being.

Despite the insurmountable boundaries that separate them, Hotaru and Gin forge an unbreakable bond that transcends the passage of time. As the years roll by, their blossoming friendship is tested by the cruel hands of fate. Hotaru matures into a young woman, while Gin remains suspended in time, a prisoner of his own curse.

In this enchanting tale of love, friendship, and sacrifice, Hotaru and Gin navigate the complexities of their emotions while respecting the one rule that governs their relationship. Will their connection endure the trials of time and the constraints of their unique circumstances? Join Hotaru and Gin in their extraordinary journey, as they unravel the true meaning of love and companionship in the heart of an enchanted forest.
